mapper.insert: insert into MEETING_COMMENT( meeting_id, user_id, context ) values (#{meetingId}, #{userId}, #{content})
mapper.select: select r.MEETING_COMMENT_ID as meetingCommentId, r.meeting_id as meetingId, r.user_id as userId, u.user_name as userName, r.context as content, to_char(r.reg_dt, 'yy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as regDate from MEETING_COMMENT r join users u on u.user_id = r.user_id where r.meeting_id = #{value} order by r.MEETING_COMMENT_ID
